definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_remove_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:FlighClashCapsule</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_set_flying"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="condition"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3400</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="entity_set_flying"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="condition"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
